class.name: EncodedObjectAsID
class.brief_description: Holds a reference to an [Object]'s instance ID.
class.description: Utility class which holds a reference to the internal identifier of an [Object] instance, as given by [method Object.get_instance_id]. This ID can then be used to retrieve the object instance with [method @GlobalScope.instance_from_id]. This class is used internally by the editor inspector and script debugger, but can also be used in plugins to pass and display objects as their IDs.

members.member: The [Object] identifier stored in this [EncodedObjectAsID] instance. The object instance can be retrieved with [method @GlobalScope.instance_from_id].
